instrumental.name: Instrumental Backing Generation
instrumental.template: Create an instrumental backing track at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM. Use the BPM to define the drum groove grid (kick/snare placement), arpeggiation rates, and rhythmic motifs. Respect selected moods and instruments. Output multi-stem audio (per instrument) at 44.1k/48k WAV and a combined preview. Include a tempo map locked to {{tempo_bpm}} throughout.

melody-from-lyrics.name: Lead Melody from Lyrics
melody-from-lyrics.template: Generate a singable lead melody from provided lyrics at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM. Ensure stepwise motion predominates; avoid melodic leaps greater than one octave. Provide timestamp mapping for each lyric line relative to the tempo grid so syllables align to beats/subdivisions derived from {{tempo_bpm}}. Output: MIDI (melody track), lyric-to-timestamp map, and a reference tone.

vocal_synthesis.name: Vocal Synthesis
vocal_synthesis.template: Synthesize a vocal performance using the specified voice profile at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM. Use the tempo to determine phrasing length, breath points, and consonant timing against the beat. Input: melody MIDI, lyrics. Output: WAV mono 44.1k/48k vocals aligned to the tempo grid at {{tempo_bpm}}.

mix_and_master.name: Mix and Master
mix_and_master.template: Mix stems and synthesized vocals at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM. Use BPM to set time-based effects (reverb pre-delay, delay times synced to note values). Target -14 LUFS integrated, preserve headroom. Output: master WAV/MP3 and per-stem WAV. Provide a simple mastering report.

video_generation.name: Video Generation
video_generation.template: Generate both 16:9 and 9:16 music video variants synced to the audio at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM. Use the BPM to time visual cuts and transitions. Burn in lyric subtitles at their timestamps. Output URLs for 16:9 MP4, 9:16 MP4, and a 30s promo clip.

prebuilt_voices.name: Prebuilt Voice Profiles
prebuilt_voices.template: Return a catalog of prebuilt voice profiles (male/female; Bengali/Hindi accents). Include demo preview URLs. Ensure speaking/singing style examples are aligned to {{tempo_bpm}} BPM for consistent auditions.

promo_clip.name: Promo Clip
promo_clip.template: Create a 30s promo social clip synced at {{tempo_bpm}} BPM highlighting chorus or hook. Include subtitles. Output a vertical MP4 and caption text.
